name: Louny Balloony
description:
The skies are a place of beauty and wonder!

Little Louny has always adored the majesty of the open air, and in this age of flight, is finally prepared to take on dazzling heights!  However, the skies are also crowded with other creatures and characters that aim to blow Louny off course.  Can you help Lou traverse this airspace of anarchy?

This gameplay demo aims to introduce you to the primary game mechanics of Louny Balloony.  Collect balloons and feathers in order to gain altitude over obstacles!  Dive, dash, and spin through the air as you navigate your way through the city skyline.

Also, keep an eye out for secrets that are hidden throughout the level. Collect them all to unlock a bonus!

Louny Balloony is being solely developed by Harold Krell.  Please show support by following me on my twitter at @harold_krell and follow the Louny Balloony Discord for more updates. Thanks for playing!

Controls
  • Arrow keys/WASD/IJKL -- General movement
  • Space -- Jump/Flap
  • C -- Special Move
  • Enter -- Pause
  • Esc -- Quit Game
  • Z/X -- Alternate button press for dashing (configured through menu)
